original_text: And the priest shall come again on the seventh day, and look. If the disease has spread in the walls of the house,
korean_text: 이레 만에 또 가서 살펴볼 것이요 그 색점이 벽에 퍼졌으면

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall come again on the seventh day
If the disease has spread in the walls of the house,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 그 집 벽에 병이 퍼졌으면
